column1: “Of the candidates possessing the  qualifications referred to in paragraph  5  above
(those)  who  have scored the  highest marks  at the Open Competitive  Examination
by  obtaining  a  minimum  of  60%  marks  on  each  subject,  the  required  number  in

order  of  merit  will  be 
interviewed  by  an
approval  of  the  Public  Service  Commission  and  on
scrutinizing  their  eligibility,  three  candidates  who  have  scored  the  highest  marks
will be selected. No marks will be assigned at the Interview Board.”
